description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Do timing design & verification SOC, MCU, or ASIC product.
              
              - Collaborate with Frond-End & Back-End to conduct & timing closure.
              
              -  Make & validate timing constraints (SDC).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Bachelor or Master Degree in Information Technology/Computer Engineering/Computer Science/Telecoms/Electronics or similar
              
              - Have experience in timing related design activity (such clock design, system control design, sign-off, synthesis, timing constraints, timing closure, Physical Design,...)
              
              - Solid knowledge in using EDA tool (Synopsys, Cadence,...)
              
              - Good written and oral communication (in English) & interpersonal skills
              
              - Have good team working and good relationship with the others
              
              - Positive & professional in work, long-term working commitment
              
              - Experienced in project management & quality control is a plus.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Attractive performance bonus (15 to 20-month salary)
               







                Private healthcare insurance for employee and family
               







                Free lunch, commuting allowance, overtime allowance, drinking supplies
